short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle the blur effect on ChatGPT side panel with AI Chat Privacy Guard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly and easily hide your ChatGPT conversation history. 

Our innovative extension blurs your conversation history at the click of a button, ensuring your conversations remain confidential, no matter where you are.

With AI Chat Privacy Guard, you'll enjoy:

ðŸ”’ Ultimate Privacy Protection: Toggle the blur feature on and off instantly, keeping prying eyes away from sensitive or personal information on your screen.

ðŸŒŸ Seamless User Experience: Designed to work effortlessly with OpenAI's ChatGPT on both desktop and mobile views, offering a smooth and uninterrupted user experience.

More Details:

Our extension is suitable for a wide range of professionals, industries, and use cases. By providing an additional layer of security and privacy, our extension can help you maintain your confidentiality in various scenarios:

Business Professionals: Consultants, managers, project coordinators, sales representatives, and many others when discussing client information or company data.

Remote Workers: Stay protected while working in co-working spaces, coffee shops, or any other public environments where your screen might be visible to others.

Educators: Teachers and professors can help keep exam questions, grading details, or student information hidden.

Healthcare Professionals: Doctors, nurses, and medical staff can protect patient information and maintain HIPAA compliance while using AI chat tools.

Legal Professionals: Lawyers, paralegals, and other legal staff can keep sensitive case details and client information private during online consultations or research sessions.

Freelancers: Writers, designers, developers, and other freelancers can use our ChatGPT chrome extension to help protect their work and maintain client confidentiality.

Researchers: Protect your intellectual property and research data while collaborating or discussing findings with colleagues.

Personal Use: Maintain your privacy when chatting for personal communication or entertainment.

By integrating our Google Chrome extension into your daily routine, you can experience the peace of mind that comes with knowing your chat history is blurred. Our easy-to-use chrome extension works with OpenAI's paid and free plans for ChatGPT, GPT 3.5, and GPT 4.
